layer.name: Order
layer.definition: Reality has patterns that can be discovered and used.

questions.text: Health and wellness follow discoverable patterns ...

answers.4: mostly — there are reliable principles for wellness
answers.5: absolutely — health follows consistent, knowable patterns
answers.2: possibly — but there's so much we don't understand
answers.3: somewhat — some patterns are clear, others aren't
answers.1: not really — health is mostly luck

questions.text: The integration of body, soul, and spirit follows principles that can be understood ...

answers.4: mostly — the integration has discernible patterns
answers.5: clearly — holistic wellness follows ordered principles
answers.2: possibly — but I don't see how
answers.3: partially — some connections are visible, others hidden
answers.1: not really — it's all too mysterious

questions.text: Neglect in one area (body, soul, or spirit) affecting the others predictably shows ...

answers.4: significant order — the parts clearly affect each other
answers.5: deep integration — neglect anywhere shows up everywhere
answers.3: some order — there's connection, but it varies

questions.text: The idea that health is purely genetic or fated is ...

answers.4: mostly wrong — health is highly influenced by behavior
answers.5: completely wrong — we have significant control within ordered principles
answers.2: partly true — genetics set most of the outcome
answers.3: mixed — genetics matter, but so do choices
answers.1: mostly true — you get what you're dealt

questions.text: There is an ordered path to wholeness that can be discovered and walked ...

answers.4: mostly — the path exists and can be found
answers.5: absolutely — wholeness follows a discoverable, walkable path
answers.2: possibly — but the path is unclear
answers.3: partially — some directions are visible, others aren't
answers.1: not really — wholeness is either given or not

remediation.advice: Wholeness isn't mysterious — it's ordered. The healthiest people you know got there through patterns, not luck. Study them. Find the principles. The order exists; you just need to discover it and align with it.

scripture.text: And the God of peace will sanctify you completely, and may your whole spirit and soul and body be kept blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
